summary: Provide a foldexpr function which give nice folding for haskell files.
name: haskellFold
description:
Provide a better folding for haskell file. The folded lines are transformed
to display the type signature (if any) of the function, providing a great
overview of your file content.

You can see some screenshot at http://twinside.github.com/vim-haskellFold/ 
GitHub repository : https://github.com/Twinside/vim-haskellFold
install_details:
Drop the file in ~/.vim/plugin or ~/vimfiles/plugin folder, or if you
use pathogen into the ~/.vim/bundle/vim-haskellFold or
~/vimfiles/bundle/vim-haskellFold

versions.release_notes: Reacting to file type instead of file extension
Showing function signature in folded text
